meanings.definition: The part of a plant embryo that develops into the lower part of the stem and roots.
meanings.sent1: The hypocotyl of the seedling grows downwards to form the roots.
meanings.sent2: The gardener carefully observed the hypocotyl as it transformed into the stem.
meanings.sent3: The playful squirrel mistook the hypocotyl for a tiny slide in the garden.
meanings.sent4: The hypocotyl, like a bridge, connects the seed to the soil below.
meanings.sent5: The green hypocotyl peeked out from the seed, eager to explore the earth.
